CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 19, 1958, pg. 14 reads: "Guest Speaker And Friends - When Andrew M. Bradley spoke Sunday at Kay Boys Club, ending National Boys' Week observance, his host was Councilman Paul F. Jones, left. Mrs. Charles Page was mistress of ceremonies at the program held at the club. Later, Attorney Jones gave a reception for Mr. Bradley at Terrace Hall Hotel. - Harris Photo."Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 19, 1958, pg. B3, reads: "Boys Club Week Speakers - This year's celebration of Boys Club Week, at Kay Boys Club, was highlighted on April 11 with an address by Dr. Harris W. Roberts (center), head of the sociology department, Virginia State College. He was introduced by Common Pleas Court Judge Homer S. Brown (right). The Rev. George D. Little (left), pastor of Friendship Community church, presided. The celebration closed on April 13, the 27th anniversary of Kay Boys Club. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of woman wearing eyeglasses and dress with rhinestone trim, standing between two men, posed in Kay Boys' Club during National Boy's Week program
